extendedInfo.description: -----------------------------------C PROGRAMS SIMPLIFIED---------------------------------C PROGRAMS SIMPLIFIED is a first offline Android application consisting of more than 200+ C Programs with Output. The application is designed in such a way that it is easy to use for all level of programmers. The Programs are classified as BASIC, DATA STRUCTURES & ALGORITHMS, MISCELLANEOUS and ALL PROGRAMS. BASIC Programs contains programs from "Hello World!" to DEMONSTRATIONS OF SSCANF,SSPRINTF etc. DATA STRUCTURES & ALGORITHMS consists of Programs of SORTING,SEARCHING and other DATA STRUCTURES. MISCELLANEOUS consists of different programs like ENCRYPTION AND DECRYPTION OF PASSWORD etc.  ALL PROGRAMS just lists  all the programs of different level in just a single list. The application is not only a single package of displaying of source codes of different programs but it also has a APTITUDE QUESTIONS related to C PROGRAMMING. There are nearly 71 Aptitude questions till now and will be increased by next update. The application is a total package aiming to help C Programmers of all level to enhance the quality of their knowledge. CHANGES IN VER 2.0 :----------------------------------ALL NEW AND ATTRACTIVE USER INTERFACE.BUGS FIXEDC APTITUDE ADDED .SEARCH FUNCTIONALITY ADDED.NEW PROGRAMS INCLUDED.SYNTAX HIGHLIGHTING WITH PERFECT INDENTING OF SOURCE CODES.PREVIOUS BUTTON & NEXT BUTTON HELPS TO VIEW THE NEXT/PREVIOUS  PROGRAMS WITHOUT GOING BACK TO LIST AGAIN.PROGRAMS ARE NOW CLASSIFIED INTO BASIC, DATA STRUCTURES & ALGORITHMS, MISCELLANEOUS .ALL THE PROGRAMS OF DIFFERENT LEVELS ARE COMBINED IN A SINGLE SEGMENT CALLED ALL PROGRAMS.SOURCE CODES INCLUDE WELL COMMENTED CODE WHICH HELPS TO UNDERSTAND THE LOGIC.PROGRAMS TOO HAVE A SAMPLE OUTPUT.COPY FEATURE HELPS TO COPY THE SOURCE CODES AND RUN THEM ON ANY COMPILERS WITHOUT ERRORS.SHARE FEATURE HELPS TO SHARE SOURCE CODES WITH FRIENDS OR EVEN MAIL IT YOURSELF.DECREASED THE APPLICATION SIZE.MOVE TO SD CARD SUPPORTED.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------IF YOU FIND THIS APP USEFUL PLEASE RATE THE APPLICATION-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------If you think any new program  or feature has to be added in this app, do shoot a mail at vinaydanaraddi@gmail.comNote:Some say that the application has a malware in it, but its not true. The application is integrated by startapp sdk and the permission for placing ads is considered as malicious by some antivirus,but the app and sdk are scanned by many high quality antivirus and turned out to be safe! Note : Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a few search points (icon, bookmark and homepage) for you to use. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. And also it displays admob ads. Thanks!Keywords : cprogramming,programming,basic c programming, basic programming, logic programming, c programming simplified,c programs, basic c programs, c, advance programming, beginner c programming,c programming for beginners.

reviews.title: Malware reported by Comodo antivirus
reviews.comment: The app fools you to install some ad-ware. even-though you can decline, it most of users will accept it. This practice is not ethical.  Edited on 27 April 13 Comodo antivirus for android detects malware while scanning. Warning from comodo: Dangerous software detected. Malicious software. we recommend you delete this item
